posts.post_content:
[quote name="V117collector" post=2362327]$799 frim, shipped w/ tracking. PPFF or add 3%

It's a beautiful card, with no creases, no ink or stamp marks on the back, very clean and centered 50/50 with extremely vibrant colors f/b. 

I believe this is the second-highest grade available with great eye appeal. 

The reason for selling this card is because it doesn't fit my low-grade sub-set.

I'd be interested in a possible trade for the following: 

1911 t212 obak ten million, Holland Creameries cards, 1953 Topps 244 willie mays or a 1959 Topps Venezuelan Willie Mays.

Please contact me via PM if interested. Brad[/QUOTE]


Gorgeous card. How is that only a 4?  Seems criminal.
I have no idea why this card is graded a SGC 4...I was thinking about cracking it out and resubmitting it to PSA'/SGC.
Now taking cash offers on this card.
